text: Kheun ayah dilon napsu keu gata Sidroe si dara lon meung peunikah PPT D PRÃ„PARATE p Lam dua nyan keu gata sidroe Jeunamee nyoe tajak tueng upah Upah lapan thon beu takeurija Lon jok si dara keu gata nyang sah Meu ek tapeutroh siploh go haji Keu droeteuh bagi tapeubuet payah Dilon kon napsu peusosah gata Janji ngon gata dilon han ubah Lon nyoe shaleh that meu kheundak Tuhan
